title: Navigating Open Source Software Risks: Whose Job Is It Anyway?
author: Aaron Linskens
description: Organizations enhance security postures by managing vulnerabilities, adhering to licensing requirements and engaging with the open source community.
cntitle: 开源软件风险导航：谁的工作？
cndescription: 组织通过管理漏洞、遵守许可要求和与开源社区互动来增强安全态势。
